You can develop allergies any time to anything, I learned that with milk.  I've been able to drink it for years and years, and suddenly I started noticing  that I have severe stomach symptoms if I drink it, or eat cheese.  I've had to switch to Lactaid milk, and Lactaid is actually really good.  It tastes just like milk.One thing is that maybe it's affecting the blood vessels.  Wine causes them to dilate, I think.  Don't quote me on that, LOL.  As we age, our bodies change, and unfortunately it's inevetible.  If you're really concerned,  you should probably see your doctor and discuss it with him/her.  I'm sorry I couldn't be of more help.jfreake
